english.segment1: No better word than from Your lips. No perfect life than what You lived. No greater gift, no not one
english.segment2: No brighter star has ever shined. No better hope for all mankind. No higher mind, no not one
english.segment3: No one has ever known. This kind of love You've shown
english.segment4: There has never been a greater love. Than Your son. No, Not one. And there will never be a name above. No, Not one
english.segment5: With His life You have forgiven us. Hope has come. Hope has come. And there will never be a greater love. No, Not one
english.segment6: No image true or sweeter frame. No simple word can match Your name. No greater fame. No not one
english.segment7: No one has ever seen. The depth of Your majesty
english.segment8: No greater call - You gave us all a reason to live. No greater love - You gave us all a reason to give. No greater life - You gave us all a reason to shine. No greater love - forever mine!
